questions.questionText: Look at the picture and choose the best description.
options: A man is reading a book
Someone is cooking in the kitchen
questions.explanation: The image shows people sitting around a table in a meeting.
questions.transcript: In the photograph, several people are gathered around a conference table, engaged in what appears to be a business meeting.

questions.explanation: The people in the image are seated at individual desks.
questions.transcript: The image depicts students or workers sitting at separate desks, possibly in a classroom or office setting.

questions.questionText: Choose the best response: 'How was your weekend?'
options: It was great, thanks for asking!
questions.explanation: Option A is the most natural and appropriate response to this question.

questions.questionText: Fill in the blank: The meeting will start ___ 3 PM.
